DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine effectiveness safety annual intravenous treatment zoledronic acid treatment osteoporosis men . All patient receive calcium vitamin D supplement .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Zoledronic Acid Treatment Osteoporosis Men
DOC.criteria: Male , 2585 year old Current user bisphosphonates Aredia® ( pamidronate ) , Didronel® ( etidronate ) , Fosamax® ( alendronate ) , Actonel ® ( residronate ) , Skelid® ( tiludronate ) History severe liver , kidney eye disease Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
